data.text: @WolfeUSA1995 Hi, Ann. We've sent you a DM regarding your concern, for us to check this for you.

@glometry We're sorry for the delay this has taken, Glometry. As mentioned, we have already coordinated your concern with our Refunds team. We'll ensure to update you the soonest we have news. Thank you.
@Dococoy We have this noted, Cocoy. We've also sent you a DM for us to check this further for you. Kindly check.
@tita_carolganda Our pleasure, Tita Carol. Thank you for choosing to fly with us. See you onboard!  ♥️

@MoonG0ddess93 We have replied to your DM, Henrietta.

@jjcoupdefoudre This is noted. Our website doesn't accept special characters. Thus, typing "N" would be okay for your booking. Hope this helps!
@maryamaldita We're sorry for this, @maryamaldita. Our flights are subject to change. May we know if you have availed of a Choice Seat?
@gelloboi We have responded to your DM, Gello.
@TheNudge4 Hello, @TheNudge4. You may check our website for our ongoing travel deals and seat sales you can enjoy with your family and friends! Please visit https://t.co/oYCABD2Bbw for more details.

urls.title: Get your PAL Supersavers!
urls.description: Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Make opportunities fly when you book now with PAL Supersavers for as low as P498 one-way economy base fare to visit local destinations and more! Pro tip: Rebooking must be done 24 hours before flight. Terms and Conditions Apply What's PAL Supersavers? PAL Supersavers is PAL's constant affordable domestic fares offering for those looking to travel in style yet within budget

urls.title: Global Reservation Hotline
urls.description: For bookings made outside Philippine Airlines' website, ticket offices, or hotline, please contact your travel agent directly. For new bookings, rebookings, and other urgent concerns, please call our reservations hotline or chat with us using our non-voice channels.

data.text: @ECPC_21 You're welcome!
@mjfelipe Got it, MJ.

@ECPC_21 (2/2) Once you have successfully booked a flight, you may send us another message with a copy of the infant's birth certificate and ticket number so we can endorse it to our team for correction.
@ECPC_21 (1/2) Hi, Eugene. Our system currently has a character limit for passengers with infants. For now, kindly shorten the name of the infant until the system accepts the booking.
@kartadadyes Oops, we've tried sending you a dm but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check.
